headline.0: Google Isn't Going To Sue Samsung Like Apple
headline.1: A Lesson for Dr. Kim and the World Bank as It Ponders the Kosovo Coal Project

short_description.0: The deal covers patents currently owned by the companies, as well as any filed in the next 10 years, the companies said in
short_description.1: As Dr. Kim and the World Bank prepare for the Kosovo project there is one question that Kosovars should be asking: Is the World Bank willing to pay for the costs of the inevitable overrun, or like the Slovenians, will the citizens of Kosovo be stuck with the check?
